dataList.name: Verminous Body
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, heal 5 HP.

dataList.name: Nutritive Reinforcements
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy, heal 20 HP, and gain 5 Defense Power Up next turn.

dataList.name: Sharp Edge
dataList.desc:
On hit, inflict 1-2 Bleed.
If a unit is Marked, attack them first.

dataList.name: Weak Morale
dataList.desc: Whenever an ally dies, permanently gain 1 Fragile.

dataList.name: Retribution
dataList.desc: When HP drops below 50%, gain 5 Attack Power Up next turn.

dataList.name: Mind Wave
dataList.desc: On hit, target loses 10 SP.

dataList.name: Injured Augmentation
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if at less than 50% HP, heal 1 HP.

dataList.name: Augmented Body
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if at less than 50% HP, heal 2 HP.

dataList.name: Corroded Augmentation
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if at less than 50% HP, heal 4 HP.

dataList.name: Big Boss
dataList.desc: When this unit is defeated, all its allies lose 45 SP.

dataList.name: Not Me Boys!
dataList.desc: This unit loses 15 SP whenever an ally is defeated.

dataList.name: Hora de Fiesta
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, all allies heal 10 SP.
At 20+ SP, gain 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Defense Power Up at turn start.

dataList.name: Se Acab√≥ la Fiesta
dataList.desc: When this unit is defeated, all its allies lose 45 SP.

dataList.name: HP Bullets
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, heal 15 HP.
At less than 50% HP, heal 15 additional HP.

dataList.name: Noble be Thy Sacrifice
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn.

dataList.name: Joy of Execution
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy, gain 2 Damage Up next turn.

dataList.name: Hammer of the One Who Grips
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, all allies heal 10 SP.
When this unit is defeated, all its allies lose 45 SP.

dataList.name: Persistence
dataList.desc: When HP drops below 50%, remove all negative status effects next turn, and gain 4 Fanatic, 1 Attack Power Up, and 1 Defense Power Up each turn.

dataList.name: Thou Shalt Hammer
dataList.desc: If this unit is Fanatic, deal +50% damage.

dataList.name: Mechanical Mentality
dataList.desc: Sanity is fixed at 0.

dataList.name: Solid Exterior
dataList.desc: Take half as much damage from Bleed and Burn.

dataList.name: Caution: Unsteady
dataList.desc: This unit's stagger threshold rises by 50% more from Tremor bursts

dataList.name: Caution: Delicate
dataList.desc: Take +30% damage from Rupture (Rounded down)

dataList.name: Damageable Disuniter
dataList.desc: After being staggered, inflict 1 less Rupture and Rupture Count

dataList.name: Damageable Thumper
dataList.desc: After being staggered, inflict 1 less Tremor and Tremor Count

dataList.name: Overheating Attack Function
dataList.desc: When staggering a unit with an attack, gain 3 Damage Up next turn.

dataList.name: Breakable Disuniter
dataList.desc: After being staggered, inflict 3 less Rupture and Rupture Count

dataList.name: Breakable Thumper
dataList.desc: After being staggered, inflict 3 less Tremor and Tremor Count

dataList.name: Spanner Up
dataList.desc: Gain Resonant by the number of heads Coins that successfully hit during a turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Rosespanner Workshop Rep
dataList.desc: Inflict more Tremor by the number of allies that have died this wave

dataList.name: Guess I'm the Last
dataList.desc: When alone, gain 1 Resonant and 1 Tremor Sync every turn.

dataList.name: I've Got No Choice
dataList.desc: When alone, marks the last unit that attacked this character as a target next turn.

dataList.name: Entangling Curse Talisman
dataList.desc: Gain Entangled Curse Talismans by the number of clashes the unit engaged in during a turn.

dataList.name: Strangling Curse Talisman
dataList.desc: At 10 Entangled Curse Talismans, raise stagger threshold by 10, then remove the status.

dataList.name: Multiplying Curse Talisman
dataList.desc: At 30% or less HP, inflict +1 Reattached Curse Talisman

dataList.name: Encroaching Curse Talisman
dataList.desc: At 30% or less HP, if the target has 5+ Reattached Curse Talisman after an attack is finished, inflict 2 Paralyze next turn.

dataList.name: Floods of Sorrow
dataList.desc: Tails Coins inflict 2 Sinking

dataList.name: Overflowing Sorrow
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, lose 5 SP

dataList.name: Intoxication
dataList.desc: At 5 Morale Boost, gain 5 Tipsy.

dataList.name: Hangover Cure
dataList.desc: At 5 Tipsy, uses a defense skill.

dataList.name: Healing Ampule Injection
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, heal 20 HP.

dataList.name: Emergency Ampule Administration
dataList.desc: At less than 25% HP, heal up to 40% of Max HP (One-time only)

dataList.name: Golden Time
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if the HP is between 12% and 24%, instantly heal up to 65% of Max HP, and recover from stagger. (One-time only)

dataList.name: Time Reversion Retroaction
dataList.desc: After activating Golden Time, gain 3 Fragile at turn end.

dataList.name: Terror Device
dataList.desc: When an ally attacks another ally, deal 3 SP damage

dataList.name: Healing Ampule Injection
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, heal 20 HP.

dataList.name: Emergency Ampule Administration
dataList.desc: At less than 25% HP, heal up to 40% of Max HP (One-time only)

dataList.name: Emergency Ampule Overdose
dataList.desc:
HP does not drop below 1;
If at 60- HP at the start of the turn, enter a powered-up state.
